TuktuTools 0.0.0.1

    • Estimating caribou calving dates and locations using the TuktuTools Package

    Movement data of barren-ground caribou

    caribou.Rd

    Movement data of barren-ground caribou

    data(caribou)

    Format

    data frame with the following columns: #'

    ID

    ID of animal

    sex

    Sex of the animal

    Time

    Date and time of each GPS location

    Year

    Year of the GPS location

    Lon,Lat

    Coordinates of the GOS locations in WGS84

    x,y

    Coordinates of the GOS locations in Canada Lambert Conformal Conic (crs = "+proj=lcc +lat_1=50 +lat_2=70 +lat_0=65 +lon_0=-120 +x_0=0 +y_0=0 +ellps=GRS80 +datum=NAD83 +units=m +no_defs")

    These are real data courtesy of NWT Department of Environment and Natural Resources but anonymized and shifted in time, longitude and latitude.

    Source

    GNWT Department of Environment and Natural Resources

    Examples

    data(caribou)
head(caribou)
#>       ID sex                Time Year       Lon      Lat         x       y
#> 1 Dancer   f 2002-04-01 00:00:00 2002 -133.8427 62.77028 -51589.97 7006600
#> 2 Dancer   f 2002-04-01 08:00:00 2002 -133.8394 62.76716 -51480.43 7006228
#> 3 Dancer   f 2002-04-01 16:00:00 2002 -133.8453 62.77767 -51584.51 7007437
#> 4 Dancer   f 2002-04-02 00:00:00 2002 -133.8643 62.80010 -52121.93 7010074
#> 5 Dancer   f 2002-04-02 08:00:00 2002 -133.8621 62.79918 -52024.50 7009953
#> 6 Dancer   f 2002-04-02 16:00:00 2002 -133.8625 62.80007 -52030.49 7010055

# plotting locations on a base graphics map
require(mapdata)
#> Loading required package: mapdata
#> Warning: there is no package called ‘mapdata’
maps::map("worldHires", xlim = c(-135,-120), ylim=c(62,67), col = "grey")
#> Error: 'worldHiresMapEnv' is not an exported object from 'namespace:maps'
ids <- levels(caribou$ID)
for(i in 1:length(ids))
  with(caribou %>% subset(ID == ids[i]), lines(Lon, Lat, col = i))
#> Error in plot.xy(xy.coords(x, y), type = type, ...): plot.new has not been called yet

# plotting points with mapview
caribou.sf <- st_as_sf(caribou %>% mutate(Lat = Lat, Lon = Lon), 
                       coords = c("Lon","Lat")) %>% st_set_crs(4326)
mapview::mapview(caribou.sf[,"ID"])

# converting to lines
lines <- caribou.sf %>% group_by(ID) %>% 
  summarize(do_union=FALSE) %>% 
  st_cast("LINESTRING")
mapview::mapview(lines[,"ID"])
